snippet: Tyler Kissinger, who was involved in a building takeover, is to appear before a disciplinary committee about 24 hours before his graduation ceremony.
abstract: University of Chicago student body president Tyler Kissinger must appear before disciplinary committee that will determine whether to expel him for allowing student protesters into administration building, day before he was supposed to graduate; university's choice of disciplinary measures differs from those of other universities that have had student protests on campus.
lead_paragraph: Tyler Kissinger, who was involved in a building takeover, is to appear before a disciplinary committee about 24 hours before his graduation ceremony.

headline.main: On Eve of Graduation, University of Chicago Student President Faces Expulsion
headline.print_headline: On Eve of Graduation, University of Chicago Student President May Face Expulsion
